A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Emotionally impactful\, epic in scope\, it hits all the right notes. Fantastic performances from the main cast add weight to a story that twists and turns. Director Rian Johnson resisted the temptation to add a derivative story heavy on fan service. What we get instead are interesting story arcs\, real suspense and the emotion behind action that makes us care about Star Wars.
